item.description:
Picnic with Lilacs at the Arnold Arboretum. Something different from our usual meetups.
http://arboretum.harv...
On the principle that most people will gather close to the main entrance I suggest we meet some distance away. The intersection of Hemlock Hill Rd and Valley Rd. Point 19 on the Arboretum map. Look for a Free State Project t-shirt.

The backup plan for rain will be the Brown Sugar. See last salon for details. If the weather looks gloomy but not actually raining then phone me 617-378-8610 and I will let you know which option has been chosen.

Each person/group should bring their own food and drink. Public alcohol consumption is forbidden in puritan Boston. So if you bring booze be discreet.

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: Lilac Picnic
